metadata.name: Celestial Peaks
metadata.description:
A fresh blanket of snow clings to the rocky mountains as they protectively watch over the villages falling into a slumber beneath. Their forms pierce towards the sky in a way that is boundless, yet fragile. Standing silently, veiled with stories and mysteries. 

Nepal is a place that took a hold of my quiet soul in a way that I would have never imagined. The Khumbu region runs deeper than a mountainous landscape, it is the ancestral home of the Sherpa people, geographically alive and steeped in spiritual and cultural significance.

Weightless # 01  
Celestial Peaks is part of an ongoing collection that reflects the essence of weightlessness found within the higher altitudes of mountains and the depths of the ocean. Each primary collector will be gifted a 9 x 12 inch ChromaLuxe metal print alongside their NFT.
